column5: HEy  is anyone else on OFC not getting PM's.  I was told by a couple of people that they sent PMs for different things and I havent received any in the last 3 days or so.  So If I havent responded to you about getting together about fishing this past weekend or the gear hat I am selling, I am sorry. I didnt get the message..  Please resend it if you like...  All the best DAVE
Personal messaging is going well. Make sure that you click "send" when you want to talk to someone.
I sent some people pm's and got no reply, I just figured they were ignoring me
There is definitely something wrong with PMS
If you have PMS, YOU have a real problem.
or they're fishin', and we aren't
seems to be working on this side. i'm slow to answer sometimes but the messanger works fine
LOL..I was Sure SOMEONE would pick up on THAT one...LOL
